full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` 'JAM DBYANGS NAG PO'I SGRUBS THABS NYUNG DU RNAM GSOL BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES 'JAM DBYANGS NAG PO'I NYUNG DU RNAM GSAL 'DI NI, DAD PA DANG RNAM DPYOD KYIS MDZES PA'I DPON KLO SANGS RGYAS SGROL MA'I ZHAL 'DON DU DZA YA PAntI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS SBYAR BA'O, 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG, BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG, MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
